% Inline support: input-path, setup-counter and include-exercise
% --- begin input-path ---
% Auto-generated input-path for exercises (points to copied external_exercises)
\makeatletter
\def\input@path{{../external_exercises/}}
\makeatother
% --- end input-path ---
% --- begin setup-counter.tex ---
% Define exercise counter if not already defined (defensive)
\makeatletter
\@ifundefined{c@exercise}{\newcounter{exercise}}{}
\makeatother
% --- end setup-counter.tex ---
% --- begin include-exercise.tex ---
% Define a simple wrapper command to include an exercise file and
% print a standardized heading. The wrapper toggles the style flag
% `\showexerciciotitle` (defined in style.tex) so the included
% exercise does not duplicate its own heading.
\providecommand{\IncludeExercise}[1]{%
  \begingroup
    \refstepcounter{exercise}%
    \noindent\textbf{Exerc√≠cio \theexercise.}\par
    \showexerciciotitlefalse
    \input{#1}%
    \showexerciciotitletrue
  \endgroup
}
% --- end include-exercise.tex ---

% Exercise inclusions

\makeatother
\IncludeExercise{QA2/external_exercises/matematica/P4_funcoes/4-funcao_inversa/determinacao_analitica/MAT_P4FUNCOE_4FX_DAX_003/main}
